name: Proper Names That Can Be Used In Scrabble [1] Quiz | Hobbies | 20 Questions

questions.text: This name is the first name of an unscrupulous Chicago bartender.  It was also given to the drink he would serve unsuspecting victims, who would lose consciousness, then wake up beaten, robbed, and sometimes unclothed.
questions.explanation:
mickey.

	"Slip him a mickey": to secretly give someone an adulterated drink or food that will render them unconscious.  Named after bartender Mickey Finn.

questions.text: "The can", "the head", "the throne": all are American slang terms for the toilet.  Which of the following names is yet another American term for the toilet?
questions.explanation:
john.

	'The Jacks' is an Irish slang word for toilet.

questions.text: Which of these girl's names also means a female donkey?
questions.explanation:
jenny.

	Females of other animals are also called jennys, such as "jenny wren".  Also, a merry-go-round is sometimes called a flying jenny.

questions.text: What boy's name is also a hereditary unit contained in DNA?
questions.explanation:
gene.

	From the word 'genetics'.

questions.text: If you were a non-com in the US army, you might refer to a low-ranking commissioned officer with what nickname?
questions.explanation:
louie.

	Short for lieutenant, pronounced loo-ten-ant in American English.

questions.text: If you were a guest on a talk show, someone might put this on you:
questions.explanation:
mike.

	Mike: to use a microphone, or the microphone itself.

questions.text: Which girl's name is also an evergreen shrub with small flowers?
questions.explanation:
heather.

	Any of various heaths, esp. Calluna vulgaris, of England and Scotland, having small, pinkish-purple flowers.

questions.text: Which boy's name is also a small valley?
questions.explanation:
glen.

	Towns are often named Glen-something because they were founded in a small, secluded valley.

questions.text: This boy's nickname - as a normal word - means stylish. The name it's derived from means precious. It's also the common name (not official name) of a theatre acting award.
questions.explanation:
tony.

	The Tony Awards (officially the Antoinette Perry Awards) are given for theatrical productions in the United States.

questions.text: This boy's name also means to put on (such as clothes):
questions.explanation:
don.

	As the Christmas carol says: "Don we now our gay apparel, fa la la fa la la, la la la."

questions.text: Which boy's name also means a long knife?
questions.explanation:
dirk.

	A dagger, esp. of the Scottish Highlands.

questions.text: What boy's nickname means to go up and down, as an object floating in water?
questions.explanation:
bob.

	"Bob" also means a short haircut style for women and children.

questions.text: You are a burglar.  You use a crowbar to open window and doors of your target houses.  Which of these names is the name for your actions on these openings?
questions.explanation:
jimmy.

	Also "jemmy" in England.

questions.text: If you got a flat tire, you would use this device to lift your car to effect repairs.
questions.explanation: jack.

questions.text: Which name also means a shade of green (a very brilliant one at that)?
questions.explanation: kelly.

questions.text: This is a synonym for a girl's boyfriend, most likely used in the Southern US.
questions.explanation:
beau.

	Also "bo".

questions.text: This popular piece of clothing was sold through the port city of Genoa, Italy in the 17th century. It was assembled in Chieri, Italy, and its raw cloth material came from Nîmes, France. It's also a girl's name.
questions.explanation:
jean & jeans.

	Genoa = jeans. De Nîmes (from Nîmes) = denim.

questions.text: This boy's name also means to move against the current.
questions.explanation:
eddy.

	Also applied to the mini-whirlpools created by backcurrents in rivers.

questions.text: If you imbibe too much, you might have to vomit.  What's a colloquial term for vomiting that's also a boy's name?
questions.explanation:
ralph.

	Yes, "ralph" is in "The Official Scrabble Players Dictionary" as a synonym for vomit.

questions.text: What boy's nickname is also a statement of costs or a check at a restaurant?
questions.explanation:
bill & tab.

	William's other popular nickname - Will - is another Scrabble-playable name.
